alert.note: Alert for Southeast Gila County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 22 at 2:54PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Gila County through 345 PM MST... At 254 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Sawmill, or 28 miles northeast of Globe, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sawmill and Hilltop. This includes US Highway 60 between mile markers 267 and 292, and between mile markers 294 and 298. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
